meanings.definition: Capable of being divided or separated into parts.
meanings.sent1: The cake was divisible into equal slices for all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The toy was designed to be easily divisible into smaller pieces for assembly.
meanings.sent3: The magician performed a trick where he made a divisible rope appear to be in two separate pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a divisible puzzle, each piece waiting to be put back together.
meanings.sent5: The divisible puzzle pieces clicked together perfectly, forming a beautiful picture.

meanings.definition: Able to be evenly divided by a specified number.
meanings.sent1: The number 10 is divisible by 2, as it can be evenly split into two equal parts.
meanings.sent2: The cake was divisible into 8 slices, each one a perfect portion for the party.
meanings.sent3: The divisible chocolate bar was shared among the friends, ensuring everyone got an equal piece.
meanings.sent4: Her time was like a divisible pie, each hour neatly portioned out for work, play, and rest.
meanings.sent5: The divisible tasks were distributed among the team, making the workload manageable for everyone.
